settings.title: Optimize Fat Burning
settings.content: Stearic Acid stimulates mitochondrial cells, accelerating the body's natural processes to burn fat more efficiently.

settings.title: Fight Cravings
settings.content: Highly bioavailable micronutrients paired with essential fatty acids ensure maximum nutrient utilization, combatting deficiency-induced cravings.

settings.title: Maintain Muscle Mass
settings.content: A blend of vital amino acids preserves muscle strength and endurance, especially crucial during weight loss.

settings.title: Boost Energy
settings.content: Optimized cellular energy production consistently elevates energy levels, ensuring vitality throughout the day.

IS THE FAT LOSS STACK FOR ME?

This stack is ideal for those seeking comprehensive nutritional support for fat loss without compromising strength, energy, or vitality.

settings.quote: I can tell a huge difference in my digestion and in the amount of energy  I have throughout the day.
settings.author: Janine H.

settings.supporting_product_description: Gut & Digestion includes tripe (stomach), intestines, pancreas, liver, and spleen. It provide strategic support for gut inflammation and digestion.
Warrior provides essential support found in grass-fed and finished heart and liver. These powerful organs include 12+ powerful nutrients to help reach your goals.

settings.primary_product_description: Firestarter includes suet (perinephric kidney fat) and helps to increase energy,  improve exercise performance, mood, insulin sensitivity, and mitochondrial  fat burning.

settings.title: POWERFUL NUTRITION FOR HEALTHY FAT LOSS
Stearic Acid
settings.nutrient_description: A crucial fatty acid that turns on mitochondrial fat-burning cells to help with weight and energy.

settings.title: Essential fatty acids
settings.nutrient_description: Support immune and cardiovascular health, as well as healthy weight management.

settings.title: Vitamin E
settings.nutrient_description: A powerful fat-soluble vitamin that acts like as an antioxidant to fight inflammation, as well as supports cardiovascular, immune, eye, and skin health.

settings.title: Vitamin K2
settings.nutrient_description: A critical fat-soluble vitamin that supports cardiovascular health, bone health, and anticarcinogenic activities.

settings.title: Alpha defensins 5 and 6
settings.nutrient_description: Antimicrobial peptides involved in the immune response.

settings.title: Gastrin-releasing Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Also known as GPR, this peptide is found in pancreatic tissue and supports digestive processes by stimulating the release of enzymes, bicarbonate, and fluids.

settings.title: Manganese
settings.nutrient_description: A vital mineral involved in antioxidant defense (Super Oxide Dismutase), thyroid function, bone health, blood sugar regulation, as well as wound healing and collagen production.

settings.title: Selenium
settings.nutrient_description: A critical mineral for thyroid function (iodothyronine deiodinanses) and immune health/antioxidant defense (glutathione peroxidase, thioredoxin reductase).

settings.title: Hepcidin Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: A peptide directly involved in iron metabolism as well as the innate immune response.

settings.title: Splenin, Tuftsin and Splenopentin Peptides
settings.nutrient_description: Exclusively found in splenic tissue which enhances immune function.

settings.title: Ergothioneine Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: An amino acid found in liver, kidney, and bone marrow found to support detoxification and longevity pathways.

settings.title: Liver Expressed Antimicrobial Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Also known as LEAP-2. This peptide is involved in immune response and glucose metabolism.

settings.title: Niacin
settings.nutrient_description: A B3 vitamin essential for cardiovascular health, mood, cognition, and energy.

settings.title: Copper, biotin, and CoQ10
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for metabolism, mood, and energy, as well as the health of skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Riboflavin, folate, B12, and choline
settings.nutrient_description: Essential for red blood cell formation, brain, reproductive, and cardiovascular health.

settings.title: Lipase, Protease, and Amylase
settings.nutrient_description: Enzymes to help break down macronutrients like fat, protein and carbohydrates.

settings.title: Colipase, Trypsin, and Pancreatic Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Support the activation of enzymes needed to break down protein and help with food allergies by improving digestion.

settings.title: CoQ10
settings.nutrient_description: Heart is nature's richest source of CoQ10, a nutrient shown to improve mitochondrial function and energy production, and to enhance exercise performance.

settings.title: Anserine & Carnosine
settings.nutrient_description: Two amino acids which are effective in reducing muscle fatigue and improving antioxidant activity.

settings.title: Taurine
settings.nutrient_description: Improves muscle function and exercise performance through the reduction of reactive oxygen species. Is also a powerful antioxidant in muscle tissue and improves insulin sensitivity.

settings.title: Creatine
settings.nutrient_description: Heart is one of nature's richest sources of this nutrient, which is crucial for muscle growth and recovery, and essential for energy production in the muscles.

settings.title: L-Carnitine
settings.nutrient_description: Required to produce energy (ATP) in the muscles, and to protect against muscle damage. Improves sport and gym performance in elite athletes.

settings.title: Vitamin A
settings.nutrient_description: Essential for muscle growth and recovery; protein synthesis and testosterone production.

settings.title: Glutamine
settings.nutrient_description: A crucial amino acid required to speed up muscle recovery and reduce delayed-onset muscle soreness.

settings.title: Iron
settings.nutrient_description: A critical trace mineral required for red blood cell formation and the repair of muscle tissue.

settings.section_description: The combined power of Fire Starter, Gut & Digestion, and Warrior includes vital and potent essential nutrients.

settings.quote: All I can say is wow!! I’ve lost 15lbs and blood pressure is down. Best I’ve felt in years!
settings.author: Heath D.

settings.title: HEART & SOIL 101
settings.instructions: Take 6 capsules, once daily, of each supplement. If you’re new to taking organ supplements, start with 1-2 capsules of each daily for the first week before increasing by one capsule daily. Consistent long-term use provides the best results.
settings.benefits: Our Fat Loss Stack aims to support sustainable fat loss while enhancing metabolism, supporting muscle retention and gut health.
settings.quality: Rigorous third-party testing by independent labs during and after manufacturing. Quality and purity information can be provided upon request.
settings.dietary: 100% additive, hormone, allergen, antibiotic, pesticide, and GMO-free. Freeze-dried. Pure nose-to-tail nourishment.

settings.title: Who should take the Fat Loss Stack?
settings.answer: This stack is for individuals who want comprehensive nutritional support to aid sustainable fat loss, while maintaining muscle mass and energy.

settings.title: What are the benefits of taking all three supplements together?
settings.answer: The combination of products in this stack work synergistically to deliver a wide range of highly bioavailable Vitamins, Minerals, Peptides, and Essential Fatty Acids that support healthy fat loss.
